title: New: Autumn – Ghost
content:
When it comes to emerging new music, there’s no doubt which part of the world is months ahead of the game round now.

For the past eighteen months or so, Australasia has been straight up killing it, particularly within the electronic scene. Brisbane duo Autumn (Jay Kane & Tom Hobbs) are just the latest in a long list of mightily exciting acts to emerge from Oceania, and they won’t be the last. Their debut track, Ghost is four and a half minutes of London Grammar meets Purity Ring exquisiteness, magnificently poised and elegant. It’s unearthing tracks like this that keep my passion for CitR alive.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
